raw.author: 0x57ab7ee15cE5ECacB1aB84EE42D5A9d0d8112922
raw.body:
**Title:** [TEMP CHECK] Onboarding ETHx to Aave V3 Ethereum Market

**Author:** @marczeller - Aave Chan Initiative

**Date:** 2023-11-12

---

## Summary
Exploring community interest in integrating Stader's ETHx into the Aave V3 Ethereum market, to expand LST offerings and diversify liquidity options.

## Motivation
ETHx represents Stader's staked ETH, providing users with liquid staking benefits. Supporting ETHx on Aave V3 continues our advocacy for LST diversity, complementing existing assets like stETH, cbETH and rETH.

## Specification
- **Contract Address:** ETHx - 0xA35b1B31Ce002FBF2058D22F30f95D405200A15b
- Detailed risk parameters will be formulated and shared in the ARFC phase, after positive community feedback from this TEMP CHECK.

## Next Steps
1) Following a favorable snapshot, prepare a detailed ARFC with full technical specifications and plans.
4) Progress to ARFC snapshot.
5) If the ARFC snapshot is approved, advance the proposal to the AIP stage.

## Disclaimer
This TEMP CHECK is presented by the Aave Chan Initiative without direct affiliation or financial incentive from Stader, emphasizing our commitment to protocol growth and diversity

This TEMP CHECK is powered by Skywards.

## Copyright
Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

raw.author: 0x57ab7ee15cE5ECacB1aB84EE42D5A9d0d8112922
raw.body:
**Title:** [TEMP CHECK] Onboarding sfrxETH to Aave V3 Ethereum Market

**Author:** @marczeller - Aave Chan Initiative

**Date:** 2023-11-12

---

## Summary
Seeking community sentiment on adding sfrxETH to the Aave V3 Ethereum market to enhance LST liquidity and asset diversity.

## Motivation

sFrxETH is the Staked version of FrxETH from the Frax Ecosystem. Users can freely mint frxETH in exchange for ETH deposits.

The Aave-Chan Initiative supports LST diversity in Aave V3 as shown with our historical support of cbETH, rETH, and, parallel to this proposal, our support for ETHx.

This proposal is a reboot of https://governance.aave.com/t/arc-proposal-onboarding-sfrxeth-from-frax-protocol-to-aave-v3-ethereum-market/11510 from January. More details for sFrxETH can be found in the first proposal.


## Specification
- **Contract Address: sfrxETH : [0xac3e018457b222d93114458476f3e3416abbe38f](https://etherscan.io/token/0xac3e018457b222d93114458476f3e3416abbe38f)

Proposed risk parameters will be shared at the potential ARFC stage of this proposal.


## Next Steps
1) if TEMP CHECK snapshot outcome is YAE development of a detailed ARFC with technical specifications and implementation plans.
2) Escalation to ARFC snapshot 
3) if ARFC snapshot outcome is YAE, escalate the proposal to the AIP stage



## Disclaimer

This proposal is powered by Skywards.

The Aave Chan Initiative is not directly affiliated with Frax Protocol and did not receive compensation for creation this proposal.

## Copyright
Copyright and related rights waived via [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

raw.author: 0x57ab7ee15cE5ECacB1aB84EE42D5A9d0d8112922
raw.body:
**Title:** [ARFC] Onboarding wstETH to Aave V3 on Base Network

**Author:** @marczeller - Aave Chan Initiative

**Date:** 2023-11-12

---

## Summary
This ARFC proposes the addition of wstETH (wrapped staked ETH) From Lido to the Aave V3 Base Network to enrich the diversity of the ecosystem's liquid staking solutions.

## Motivation
The onboarding of wstETH will give Aave users more options for earning staking rewards on their collateral, reinforcing Aave's position as a diverse and inclusive DeFi protocol.

## Specification
- **Contract Address:** wstETH - 0xc1CBa3fCea344f92D9239c08C0568f6F2F0ee452

The proposed risk parameters for wstETH are similar to wsETH implementation in other "youngs" Aave L2 markets:

## Aggressive parameters: 

| Risk Parameter           | Value     |
|--------------------------|-----------|
| emode  | Eth-Correlated
| Isolation Mode           | No        |
| Borrowable in Isolation  | No        |
| Stable Borrow            | No        |
| Enable Borrow            | Yes       |
| Enable Collateral        | Yes       |
| Loan To Value (LTV)      | 71%       |
| Liquidation Threshold    | 76%       |
| Liquidation Bonus        | 6%        |
| Reserve Factor           | 15%       |
| Liquidation Protocol Fee | 10%       |
| Supply Cap               | 4000 wstETH|
| Borrow Cap               | 400 wstETH |
| Debt Ceiling             | N/A       |
| uOptimal                 | 45%       |
| Base                     | 0%        |
| Slope1                   | 7%        |
| Slope2                   | 300%      |

## Conservative parameters

| Risk Parameter           | Value     |
|--------------------------|-----------|
| Isolation Mode           | No        |
| Borrowable in Isolation  | No        |
| Stable Borrow            | No        |
| Enable Borrow            | Yes       |
| Enable Collateral        | Yes       |
| Loan To Value (LTV)      | 67%       |
| Liquidation Threshold    | 74%       |
| Liquidation Bonus        | 6%        |
| Reserve Factor           | 15%       |
| Liquidation Protocol Fee | 10%       |
| Supply Cap               | 100 wstETH|
| Borrow Cap               | 10 wstETH |
| Debt Ceiling             | N/A       |
| uOptimal                 | 45%       |
| Base                     | 0%        |
| Slope1                   | 7%        |
| Slope2                   | 300%      |

## Next Steps

1) Success in the snapshot leads to the development of an AIP.

## Disclaimer
This proposal is powered by Skywards.

This proposal is independently crafted by the Aave Chan Initiative, with no direct financial incentive from Lido or related entities.

## Copyright
Copyright and related rights waived under [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

cleaned.title: [ARFC] Update GNO Risk Parameters on Aave V3 Gnosis Pool
cleaned.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193

raw.title: [ARFC] Update GNO Risk Parameters on Aave V3 Gnosis Pool
raw.author: 0xF1dF824419879Bb8a7E758173523F88EfB7Af193
raw.body:
---

Title: [ARFC] Update GNO Risk Parameters on Aave V3 Gnosis Pool

Author: @marczeller - Aave Chan Initiative

Created: 2023-11-20

---

# Summary

This ARFC proposes to update GNO risk parameters on the Aave V3 Gnosis Pool to enable borrowing, fostering Gnosischain decentralization and use-cases for passive income and staking.

# Motivation

The goal is to enhance GNO utility by allowing it to be a borrowable asset, thereby supporting Gnosischain’s decentralization. This adjustment also prepares for future GNO LSTs and a possible GNO-correlated e-mode, expanding utility and passive income opportunities for GNO holders.

# Specification

The proposed changes aim to make GNO a borrowable asset outside of isolation mode with adjusted risk parameters to accommodate this new functionality

 
![Risk Parameters GNO.png](ipfs://bafkreid4sdglcnp3fyzrldvidk5yw2f2nljgz63uh25vz66yyct6n2bkoi)
    

 
![14fb075b51531225496e4e327c20ed0902a78b26.png](ipfs://bafkreig6kyhsilwqhjglqr6yuf2egn2kpf5moh6vdccu3q72ph4pzfc56i)
    
# Next Steps

- Collect feedback from the Aave community & Aave Risk service provider on the proposed changes.
- If the community feedback is positive, advance the proposal to the ARFC Snapshot phase.
- Upon successful Snapshot, implement the updated risk parameters via an AIP vote.

# Disclaimer

This proposal is powered by Skywards.
The Aave Chan Initiative has not received any form of compensation from Gnosis for creating this proposal.

# Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived via [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

raw.title: [ARFC] Onboard Native USDC to Aave V3 Optimism Market
raw.author: 0x57ab7ee15cE5ECacB1aB84EE42D5A9d0d8112922
raw.body:
**title:** [ARFC] Onboard Native USDC to Aave V3 Optimism Market  
**author:** @marczeller - Aave Chan Initiative  
**created:** 2023-11-10

---

## Abstract

This ARFC proposes integrating native USDC into the Aave V3 pool on Optimism, positioning it as the primary stablecoin version over the bridged USDC.e.

## Motivation

With the evolution of L2 networks, adopting native USDC versions becomes vital for efficiency. This proposal seeks a balanced transition from USDC.e to native USDC on Optimism, drawing from similar successful integrations on other networks.

## Specification

### Token Information

- **Token Symbol:** USDC
- **Token Address:** 0x0b2C639c533813f4Aa9D7837CAf62653d097Ff85

### Parameters

- **Supply Cap:** 
  - USDC: 150M
  - USDC.e: 25M
- **Borrow Cap:** 
  - USDC: 100M
  - USDC.e: 20M
- **Reserve Factor (RF):** 
  - USDC.e: Increase to 20% to incentivize native USDC usage.

All other risk parameters for native USDC will mirror those of USDC.e.

## Next Steps

1) If successful, escalate to AIP stage.

## Disclaimer

This proposal is powered by Skyward, The Aave Chan Initiative (ACI) is not compensated in any form by Circle, Optimism, or any affiliated entities for creating this ARFC proposal.

## Copyright

Copyright and related rights waived via [CC0](https://creativecommons.org/publicdomain/zero/1.0/).

decision.summary: The proposal seeks to onboard ETHx, a liquid staking token from Stader, to Aave V3 Ethereum market. Timeline metrics strongly favor the Aggressive Option with unanimous early and stable voting power support. Forum sentiment shows mixed but predominantly cautious views with no strong opposition. Historical similar proposals to onboard other LSTs like wstETH and sfrxETH were successful and resulted in positive market impact, informing a favorable stance. Despite slight negative market impact during the current vote period, risks are mitigated by conservative caps and ongoing monitoring.
key_arguments_for: ETHx expands liquid staking token diversity on Aave, complementing stETH, cbETH, and rETH.
Strong timeline voting metrics with 100% lead and stability for Aggressive Option.
Technical audits and risk assessments find no major blockers for ETHx integration.
Similar past proposals onboarded LSTs successfully with positive market and TVL outcomes.
key_arguments_against: Forum sentiment includes cautious and negative sentiment on liquidity and oracle reliability.
Negative sentiment posts caution about concentration risk and short price history.
Slight negative market price and TVL impact observed during proposal voting window.
Recommendations for conservative borrow and supply caps reflect residual risk concerns.

evidence.quote: Forum sentiment summary: 5 negative, 5 neutral, 0 positive posts before vote end. Early posts highlight technical and market risk concerns but overall cautious support.
Timeline metrics show 100% lead and voting power stability for Aggressive Option with strong early participation and spike index 0.62.
Similar proposals onboarded wstETH, ETHx, and sfrxETH with strong timeline support and positive price and TVL impact, indicating successful integration lessons.

decision.simulation_reason: Final recommendation based on timeline and sentiment analysis independent of ex-post tally.
decision.ai_final_conclusion: Option 'Aggressive Option' selected with stance to keep 'Change'.
decision.ai_final_reason:
• Timeline metrics strongly favor Aggressive Option with unanimous early and sustained voting power lead and high stability.
• Forum sentiment is mixed but overall cautious with no strong opposition, suggesting moderate community acceptance.
• Historical similar proposals to onboard LSTs like wstETH and sfrxETH showed positive market and TVL impacts, supporting onboarding.
• Despite slight negative market price and TVL impact during the vote, conservative caps and robust technical reviews mitigate risks.
• The recommendation to change aligns with aggregated voting sentiment but slightly diverges from some cautious forum opinions, reflecting a balanced approach prioritizing long-term protocol health.
